reviewQuestionAnswesViews.QuestionText: Is the salary as per market standard?
Tell us about your last increment
How many hours you normally work in a day?
Does Mphasis Ltd have a flexible working hours policy?
How often do you have parties/offsites?

answersView.AnswerTextHi: प्रबंधन इस पर विश्वास नहीं करता है

reviewQuestionAnswesViews.QuestionText: How often do employees get promotions?
How many trainings do you attend every year?

answersView.AnswerText: More than 6 times in a year
answersView.AnswerTextHi: एक वर्ष में 6 बार से अधिक

detailedDescription.articleBody: Mphasis Limited is an IT services company based in Bangalore, India. The company provides infrastructure technology and applications outsourcing services, as well as architecture guidance, application development and integration, and application management services.
detailedDescription.articleBodyHi: Mphasis Limited एक IT सेवा कंपनी है जो बैंगलोर, भारत में स्थित है। कंपनी अवसंरचना प्रौद्योगिकी और अनुप्रयोग आउटसोर्सिंग सेवाएं प्रदान करती है, साथ ही वास्तुकला मार्गदर्शन, अनुप्रयोग विकास और एकीकरण, और अनुप्रयोग प्रबंधन सेवाएं,
